content:
I'm trying to understand how to implement the helper function `validate_inclusion_lists`

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4003/files#diff-26426b9b899404021b0ddbc114d42e93a98ebf34b93b4d2b7c8175180599b6a2R32-R41
 
in the case where some transactions in the IL arent included, it seems like the cl will need to make an engine api request in the payload to verify transaction validity?

author: terence0083
content:
It's in the engine api as defined here: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/609
if new payload returned something like `INVALID_INCLUSION_LIST`, you would flag the block and the attesters would vote for its parent block subsequently
